title: user authentication with hcaptcha validation
description: Test the user signup and login process including hCaptcha validation to ensure secure authentication and proper session management via Supabase.

title: product browsing and cart management
description: Verify that users can browse products, add items to the cart with correct quantity limits, and that the cart state updates optimistically and syncs with localStorage.

title: checkout process with promo code validation
description: Test the checkout flow including address selection, promo code application with backend validation, and final order creation ensuring backend price confirmation and order email dispatch.

title: user order history viewing
description: Verify that users can view their past orders accurately with correct order details and status updates.

title: admin order management and tracking update
description: Test the admin dashboard functionalities for managing orders, updating shipment tracking information, and ensuring audit logs are recorded correctly.

title: user profile and address book management
description: Verify that users can manage their profile settings and address book entries including adding, editing, and deleting addresses.

title: frontend responsiveness and accessibility
description: Test the frontend UI responsiveness and accessibility across different devices and screen sizes under typical and peak load conditions.
